ygData.subject: Guess Who Wahahahaha wahahaha haaaaaaaa

Somewhere, sometime a garbage barge scans a ship it had pulled out of a tem=
poral anomaly. 

two bots from the recycling center scan the crew. "Your an=
alysis bones?" the first asks in a repetitive, monotone, bad acting tempo.
=

"HE'S DEAD JIM!" the second replies in a scratchy argumentative tone.

As =
the two scan the wreckage the anomaly becomes unstable. the two watch in fe=
ar as the temporal field overtakes them.

"BRIGHT LIGHT< BRIGHT LIGHT!" the=
 first calls out as the light overtakes them.

"The light!!! It hurts my ey=
es! Quick change the channel." he cries out in helpless anguish as the ship=
 is hurtled through time and space.

The light settles and only one remaine=
d on board. "Captains log, we travell through time to help history along, g=
ive it a push where it's needed."

elsewhere on a burned out, forrested, wa=
rtorn planet the second of the two awakes to find "I don't think I'm in Kan=
sas anymore." he states carrying a confused, almost innocent look on his fa=
ce. He scanns the planet around him and finds a strong trace of Cybertroniu=
m nearby. He enters a cave and finds about a dozen robots petrified in the =
cave wall. The lone bot reaches out to touch one of the bots creating anoth=
er anomaly. He looks around, the cave and the bots were all gone. He opened=
 his comm hoping somebody was friendly on this strange new world. The comm =
called out, "SOMEWHERE, OUT THERE, SOMEBODY NEEDS HEEEEELP."
